lead_paragraph: The Connecticut Sun acquired the former University of Connecticut star Barbara Turner in a trade with Houston that sent forward Megan Mahoney to the Comets. The 6-foot Turner was originally drafted by Seattle as the 11th overall pick in the 2006 W.N.B.A. draft. She averaged 4.2 points in 22 games with the Comets.
